Description: Standard language to query and transform data in relational databases.
Typical Use Cases: Analytics queries, data modeling, ETL/ELT transformations
Common Pairings: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Snowflake, BigQuery, dbt, Power BI

Description: General-purpose language with core libraries for data manipulation and analysis.
Typical Use Cases: Data cleaning, notebooks, ETL scripts, ML prototyping
Common Pairings: Jupyter, Spark, Airflow, scikit-learn, AWS Lambda

Description: BI platform for interactive reports and dashboards.
Typical Use Cases: Business dashboards, self-service analytics, KPI reporting
Common Pairings: SQL Server, Azure Synapse, Excel, DAX, Power Query

Description: Visual analytics platform for advanced data exploration.
Typical Use Cases: Exploratory analysis, storytelling, executive dashboards

Description: Ubiquitous spreadsheet for quick analysis and lightweight dashboards.
Typical Use Cases: Ad hoc analysis, data cleaning, KPI tracking
Common Pairings: Power Query, Power BI, CSV/Parquet exports

Description: Workflow orchestrator for production data pipelines.
Typical Use Cases: Scheduled ETL/ELT, dependency management, data SLAs
Common Pairings: Spark, BigQuery, Redshift, Snowflake, Docker, Kubernetes

Description: SQL-first framework for transformations inside the data warehouse.
Typical Use Cases: Data modeling, tests, documentation, ELT transformations

Description: Distributed processing engine for large-scale batch and ML workloads.
Typical Use Cases: Large-scale ETL, feature engineering, lakehouse processing

Description: Event streaming platform and durable commit log for real-time data.
Typical Use Cases: Real-time pipelines, CDC, event-driven architectures
Common Pairings: Flink, ksqlDB, Spark Structured Streaming, Kinesis

Description: Serverless data warehouse on Google Cloud for analytics/ELT.
Typical Use Cases: Analytical warehousing, ELT, federated queries, ML with BQML

Description: Cloud data warehouse with separation of storage and compute; multi-cloud.
Typical Use Cases: Analytical warehousing, data sharing, ELT, governance
Common Pairings: dbt, Fivetran, Power BI, Tableau, Airflow

Description: Managed data warehouse service on AWS.
Typical Use Cases: Data warehousing within AWS stack, ELT

Description: Cloud platform with data ingestion, storage, compute, ML and governance.
Typical Use Cases: End-to-end data platforms, lakehouse, real-time, ML
Common Pairings: S3, Glue, Redshift, EMR, Lambda, Kinesis, Athena

Description: Microsoft cloud data stack (ADLS, Synapse, ADF, Databricks, Fabric).
Typical Use Cases: Data warehousing, lakehouse, enterprise BI, ML
Common Pairings: Synapse/Fabric, ADLS, ADF, Power BI, Databricks

Description: GCP data stack (GCS, BigQuery, Dataflow, Pub/Sub, Vertex AI).
Typical Use Cases: Serverless analytics, streaming, ML/GenAI integration

Description: Containerization to package and run apps/pipelines consistently.
Typical Use Cases: Local dev, CI/CD, reproducible data pipelines

Description: Container orchestration for scalable, resilient workloads.
Typical Use Cases: Distributed pipelines, microservices for data platforms
Common Pairings: Docker, Spark, Kafka, Airflow, Helm, Argo

Description: Leading relational database known for stability and extensions.
Typical Use Cases: OLTP/OLAP hybrid, analytics marts, app backends

Description: Popular relational database for web apps and simple analytics.
Typical Use Cases: App backends, small analytics marts
Common Pairings: SQL, Airflow, Power BI, Looker Studio

Description: Microsoft relational DB with integrated BI/ETL ecosystem.
Typical Use Cases: Enterprise apps, warehousing with SSIS/SSAS/SSRS

Description: Document-oriented NoSQL DB for semi-structured data.
Typical Use Cases: Event logs, product/catalog data, flexible schemas
Common Pairings: Kafka, Spark, Python, Atlas, BI connectors

Description: Semantic modeling (Looker) and lightweight reporting (Studio) on GCP.
Typical Use Cases: Modeled BI layer, dashboards, self-service analytics

Description: Open, columnar, compressed file format optimized for analytics.
Typical Use Cases: Data lakes, lakehouse, efficient storage and scans

Description: ACID transactions and time travel over data lakes.
Typical Use Cases: Lakehouse tables, upserts/merges, schema evolution

Description: Open table format for lakehouse with modern partitioning and catalog.
Typical Use Cases: Open lakehouse, multi-engine tables, schema evolution

Description: Data quality testing/validation framework for pipelines.
Typical Use Cases: Data validation, contracts, CI for data quality
